version_description: A few more fixes for iOS 11

• Dreamy, edgy, romantic, warm, cold, dramatic ... enhance your video’s mood with the Light Leaks Power Pack
• Light Leak Transitions Power Pack lets you move between clips in a flash of brilliance!
• Free Clip Mixer light leak effect
• Free Clip Mixer light leak transition
• Multi-Layer includes the new “Just Dance” outline effect

• Can again import clips shorter than 3 seconds
• Eliminated a freeze/crash in Multi-Layer and elsewhere
• Other improvements and bug fixes
Another bug fix for iOS 10 and Multi-layer

• Draw Lab: Express your imagination with animated drawings! Make freeform images, draw over video clips, or create stop-motion figures with automatic looping. Edit color, shape, size, and more to refine your vision.
• Portrait and Square video formats in addition to classic Landscape. Create videos to match your needs when posting to YouTube, musical.ly, Instagram, Instagram stories, and elsewhere.
• Edit in landscape *OR* portrait orientation. Just rotate your device and the screen automatically rearranges to match!
• FREE color filters: Video Smear and Video Melt
• FREE clip mixer effect: Grids

• Mirror House effect now works with Square and Vertical videos!
• Video Melt no longer zooms!
• Fixed freeze/crash trying to load QR Preset
• Fixed sending scene to cameral roll bug
• Fixed bug with 3D text
• And many other fixes

* If you are running iOS 9.1/9.2 we strongly suggest updating your OS

* Are you having a hard time running Video Star in landscape mode? Be sure to turn off the Rotation Lock in Apple's Control Center.
错误修复和其他改进
错误修复和其他改进

• New FREE Layout effect: Vortex
• Other bug fixes and improvements

• Fixed some bugs with 4x5 video projects
• Fixed bug with Motion Madness
• Fixed some other bugs
Improved the new multi-layer setup, added a new color layer option, and fixed a number of bugs based on your feedback. Thanks!

• Multi-Layer has become faster and more powerful with the ability to add more key-framed video layers!
• Key framing has been enhanced up with new transition curves, tap-able/step-able controls, and the ability to drop a key sframe.
• New Tracking Blur effect.
• Free Layout Spin, Swirl, Skew, Squish, & Slide effects.
• Free Color Vibrance effect.
• Many fixes and improvements.
Improved the new multi-layer setup, added a new color layer option, and fixed a number of bugs based on your feedback. Thanks!
Bug fixes and other improvements

Fixed bug when trying to make a square or portrait project
Fixed issue with music/beat effects when re-effecting

• 新增 4x5 视频格式，非常实用 Instagram 贴文使用！
• 新增可用关键帧的多层变形特效
• 全新“自定义着色”强力资源包，这是颜色定制的终极之选！
• 全新“色彩魔法”强力资源包，提供大量亮丽色彩
• 使用 QR 码图像分享并导入剪辑变形器预设
• 更多免费变形特效：漩涡 2、漩涡 3、膨胀和扭曲

• Fixed some bugs with 4x5 video projects
• Fixed bug with Motion Madness
• Fixed some other bugs

Added color/erase linking to photo masking
Fixed problem saving 4x5 1080p videos on some devices (won't be able to save old ones though)
Fixed touch effects not always working on re-effect
Fixed some issues with photo effect masking
Fixed crash bug when cancelling an import.

• Editing is faster than ever! Open a project go directly to the Edit screen. Tap the “Add” button and import a photo to create a new scene without recording any video.
• New Color Magic 2 Power Pack: vivid, subtle, bold, black & white, and duotone professional color gradings.
• Clip Transformer’s Custom Coloring Effect is hugely expanded: include blooms, streaks, lines, and Color Magic color gradings.
• Cinema Pro Pack is expanded to include Multi-Layer effects “Spin Blur” and “Spin Focus.” And Tracking Blur now also blurs when a layer is rotating or zooming.
• Multi-Layer includes “multi expand” in addition to “mirror expand”.
• New FREE Multi-Layer distortions: Squish 2, Swirl 4, and Nightmare
• Now localized into Polish

Tracking blur now lets you choose what type of motion gets blurred
Pasting video clip now works correctly
Bug fixes and improvements

• Modify Clip "Flexible" fixed
• AE/AF lock now saved when going back and forth between Edit/Record
• Fixed Paste Clip bug
• Turned down the Zoom Blur a bit
• QR presets don't require network if you've imported them before
• Other bug fixes and improvements

Custom Coloring Streaks and Blooms can now be tinted!
Other bug fixes and improvements.

Add two more Multi-Layer mirror options!
Fixed re-effecting bug
Fixed bug when importing video

New, FREE Layout effect: Wave!
Improvements to Custom Coloring Streak & Bloom tinting
Fixed photo import bug
Fixed bug when turning on notifications
Other bug fixes and improvements

- New 4x3 video format. Rock it like a 1987 VHS tape!!!
- Fullscreen layouts on iPhone X
- Other bug fixes and improvements

Color Magic is now free to use in Custom Colorings!
Fixed zoom glitch in Tracking Blur.

• Time Slicer Power Pack creates strips of magical motion
• Two FREE layout effects: Sine and Swirl In
• Share & import single layer keyframe presets
• Bug fixes and other improvements

• New FREE Layout effect: Vortex
• Other bug fixes and improvements

Some sweet, new masking shapes in multi-layer!
FREE Bulge 2 effect!
Fixed some bugs and other improvements.

• 3 new options for FREE Nightmare effect
• Fixes for Video & Photo Import, Bulge 2, and more

• Psycho Sorter Power Pack! A face-melting, brain-bending effect of fun and weirdness.
• Dark Mode: now you can edit all night!
• New background patterns and more ways to customize the app!
• Layout Block Enlarge & Shrink effects are now also in Multi-Layer (part of the Mondrian Attacks Power Pack)

• Music Distort has new direction and speed options, and is now in Multi-Layer!
• Bug fixes and other improvements

FREE: a new Mid-Sine layout effect!
Multi-layer's Shape mask now remembers the last shape.
Other bug fixes & improvements.

• New Multi-Layer Zaps! Power Pack … energetic & fun little animations!
• Multi-Layer now has ten (10! TEN!!) layers!!!
• Mark effect types as Favorites for quick, easy use!
• Editable Multi-Layer masks for photos, color, and 2D text.
• FREE “Edge Zoom” effect with 5 variations!
• NOTE: Now requires iOS 10 or newer

• New dark background option while masking in Multi-layer.
